definition: classifier for gifts, newspaper, magazine, papers, reports, contracts etc/variant of 分[fen4]

sentences.english: February was definitely not a good month for the automobile industry in America.
sentences.chinese: 二月份鐵定是美國汽車工業銷售慘淡的一個月。

sentences.english: The gathering will be next February in Rome.
sentences.chinese: 該會議將在明年二月份在羅馬舉行。

sentences.english: A new game for Mac computers will be released in February.
sentences.chinese: 一款麥金塔電腦上的新遊戲將在二月份發行。

sentences.english: But he suffered a stress fracture in February and started playing again only in mid-July.
sentences.chinese: 但是二月份他嚴重骨折，七月中旬才重新開始打球。

sentences.english: In the north, polar night(6) reigns for much of December.
sentences.chinese: 十二月份的大多數日子，北部地區都處於極夜。

sentences.english: The March figure for output value registered a 37 per cent increase over February.
sentences.chinese: 三月份產值比二月份增長百分之三十七。

sentences.english: They often go skiing in Decem ber.
sentences.chinese: 他們經常在十二月份去滑雪。

sentences.english: David will have a niece or nephew this December .
sentences.chinese: 大衛十二月份將有一個小侄女或小侄子降生。

sentences.english: The company laid off 250 workers in December.
sentences.chinese: 這家公司十二月份解僱了兩百五十個工人。

sentences.english: The finding was reported in the February Archives of General Psychiatry.
sentences.chinese: 這項發現發表在二月份的《普通精神病學檔案》上。

sentences.english: Thee woman, named Wang Shi, became pregnant last February.
sentences.chinese: 該女子名爲王師，於去年二月份懷孕。

sentences.english: His new book will be published in February.
sentences.chinese: 他的新書將在二月份出版。

sentences.english: I started my measurements in October and tested my models through December.
sentences.chinese: 我的測試在十月份開始持續到十二月份。

sentences.english: Yes, sir, five or six months ago--last February.
sentences.chinese: 是的，先生，差不多在五六個月以前，二月份死的。

sentences.english: The shot was taken in February at one of the Kremlin gates.
sentences.chinese: 這張照片是在二月份的時候拍攝於克林姆林宮門口。

definition: start of month/early in the month
